00193  static bool IsCompressionSupported(WORD uCompressionMethod)
00194  {  
00195   return uCompressionMethod == methodStore || uCompressionMethod == methodDeflate
00196    ;
00197  }

00233  virtual void InitCompression(int iLevel, CZipFileHeader* pFile, CZipCryptograph* pCryptograph) 
00234  {
00235   InitBuffer();
00236   m_uComprLeft = 0;

00240 
00255  virtual void InitDecompression(CZipFileHeader* pFile, CZipCryptograph* pCryptograph)
00256  {
00257   InitBuffer();
00258   m_pFile = pFile;
00259   m_pCryptograph = pCryptograph;
00260 
00261   m_uComprLeft = m_pFile->GetDataSize(false, true);
00262   m_uUncomprLeft = m_pFile->m_uUncomprSize;
00263   m_uCrc32 = 0;
00264  }

00417  void FlushWriteBuffer()
00418  {
00419   if (m_pCryptograph)
00420    m_pCryptograph->Encode(m_pBuffer, (DWORD)m_uComprLeft);
00421   m_pStorage->Write(m_pBuffer, (DWORD)m_uComprLeft, false);
00422   m_uComprLeft = 0;
00423  }

00453  virtual int ConvertInternalError(int iErr) const
00454  {
00455   return iErr;
00456  }
00457 
00473  void ThrowError(int iErr, bool bInternal = false)
00474  {
00475   if (bInternal)
00476    iErr = ConvertInternalError(iErr);
00477   CZipException::Throw(iErr, m_pStorage->IsClosed(true) ? _T("") : (LPCTSTR)m_pStorage->m_pFile->GetFilePath());
00478  }
